commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: The fifth contest will be a test of stamina!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Here it is, the physical fitness test!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: The four things all school idols need are singing ability, dance skills, expressiveness, and stamina!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: You have to sing and dance on stage for a long time as an idol. Regular amounts of stamina won't get you through it.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I get that. You can get so tired in the latter half of a play, but no matter how tired you get, you can't let the audience sense it.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Right. You can't let all those people who came here for a great time see you stumbling and tired on stage!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Exactly. So, we're going to see if you have the stamina to keep up a perfect performance on stage.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: This contest will be a long distance race! The first to complete 20 laps around this 200 meter track wins!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: 20 laps... That's four kilometers!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Now, who to put out from Î¼'s...

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: When it comes to exercise, you can't go wrong with Rin.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Okay! I'll do my best.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: A long distance race... It's so simple, but so perfect for measuring stamina.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: What should we do? Who's going to run?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I don't have any confidence, so not me.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I-I can't either. I don't think this is my time to shine.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: It's not going to just be a test of stamina, but of willpower, too.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (The people who haven't competed for us yet are Ayumu, Kasumi, Ai, Rina, and Setsuna.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Having the stamina to stay on stage for a long time... I'm sure Setsuna can do it with all her live show experience!)

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: I'll do this one!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I've heard people call you the helper of the sports clubs, Ai. You must be quite physically fit!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: You could say that! I'm still not that confident in school idol stuff like singing, but you can count on me when it comes to sports!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Ai, are you sure?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: You're such a worrier. I'll do my best so I won't have to apologize for losing. Cheer for me, okay?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Are you ready? Set? Start!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Mya!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: She's fast!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Go Rin!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Rin, do your best!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Ai, get 'em!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Rin is amazing.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Yeah, she keeps getting faster! She's like the wind!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Ai...

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Ai told us to leave it to her, and now she's being left in the dust!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Mmm... She hasn't dropped her pace at all though.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Her pace?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: In a long distance run, you'll burn out if you don't pace yourself properly.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah, if you use all your energy in the beginning, you'll be walking to the finish line. Huh?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: The secret to this contest might not just be stamina or willpower after all.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Rin, go! Only a little more!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Rin, you're almost there!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: *Huff* I won't...lose...

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: *Chuckle* That's my line! Finish!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Was that a tie?!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: N-No... Ai seems to have won by a hair.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: So Ai was faster.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: YES!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Myahh!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: All right! Ai, you're great!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Don't make us worry like that.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Ai, thank you. Great work out there.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: *Giggle* That's three wins. I put us in the lead.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Whew. I can barely move.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Rin!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Why did you go so fast from the start?

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: I had a plan when I started, but the wind felt so good I couldn't help but run faster and faster.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: You seemed so alive when you ran. It looked so fun!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: *Chuckle* It was fun. Ai is so incredible. She had a fire in her eyes that said she wouldn't lose.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: I want to race her again. Or maybe we could just play sports together.
